alfredsnippet.snippet:
Jerry L Zeigler, YHWH, p.154

"But, reader, go ahead and live in your little world without considering the Whole; back into the corner of the expert and tell me the world is not round and continuous and beautiful and exciting. If you back up far enough, you're bound to be correct, and then you will be crowned king of the corner with a cone-shaped hat."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - King of the Corner
